hero.title: 35+ Years of Excellence
hero.subtitle: Premium construction materials and contracting services across Maharashtra. Building trust since 1985.

about.title: Building Excellence Since 1985
about.description: Established in Nagpur, Maharashtra, Shyam Trading Company has been a leading contractor specializing in diverse interior and exterior building projects. With over three decades of experience, we have consistently delivered excellence in both commercial and residential refurbishments.

testimonials.name: Rajesh Kumar
testimonials.text: Exceptional quality and timely delivery. Shyam Trading Company has been our trusted partner for over 10 years.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.text: Professional team with excellent craftsmanship. Their attention to detail is remarkable.

testimonials.name: Amit Patel
testimonials.text: Highly recommended for any construction project. Quality products at competitive prices.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.description: Get in touch with our expert team for a free consultation and quote. Let's bring your vision to life with our premium materials and services.
